articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 350
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Unit 350
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, inspected KPA Unit 350.
					 He went round the monument to field guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, the room for education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 Watching the precious historic materials, he recalled the proud course covered by the unit for its development under the guidance of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He stressed the need to intensify the education in undying leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il and train all servicepersons to be persons strong in idea and faith alike Kim Jong Il and a-match-for-a-hundred fighters crossing any high mountain and marshland at a go and stalwart warriors beating back any formidable enemy at a stroke.
					
					 He also toured the operation study room, military lecture room and the general training room to learn in detail about the unit's combat duty and training.
					
					 He praised the officers and soldiers of the unit for having performed admirable feats in the training for this year out of their desire to adorn the 70th anniversary of the WPK with signal achievements in combat and political training.
					
					 The unit has a very important mission to discharge, the Supreme Commander said, advancing the tasks to be carried out by it in increasing its combat strength in every way. 
					
					 Going round the library and soldiers' hall of the unit, he said it should train servicepersons to be those possessed of versatile knowledge so that their military service may become a course of the revolutionary university.
					
					 He underlined the need to direct efforts to intensifying the five-point education set forth by the Party in order to train all servicepersons to be indomitable fighters keeping their revolutionary faith though they may die.
					
					 He also went round a mess, daily provision store, bean store, etc. 
					
					 Saying that to do supply service well for soldiers is essential to rounding off the combat preparations, he urged the commanding officers to always pay deep attention to it, mindful that the supply service is just for defending socialism.
					
					 Walking for a while in the compound of the unit command that reminds one of a rest home, he had talks with its commanding officers and acquainted himself with the management of the unit.
					
					 Pleased to see thick forests in surrounding mountains, he called upon the People's Army to naturally take the lead in implementing the noble intention of the Party to turn the country into a thick woodland and greenery.
					
					 He gave the unit a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle as gifts and posed for a picture with its servicepersons.
					
					 Accompanying him were Hwang Pyong So and O Kum Chol.

articles.title: DPRK FM Spokesman Slams U.S. for Pulling Up DPRK over Issue of Freedom of Religion
articles.content:
DPRK FM Spokesman Slams U.S. for Pulling Up DPRK over Issue of Freedom of Religion
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry gave the following answer to the question raised by KCNA on Friday as regards the fact that the U.S. unreasonably pulled up the DPRK over the issue of freedom of religion:
					 On October 14 the U.S. Department of State in its "2014 International Religious Freedom Report" malignantly slandered the DPRK as a "country of special concern" and "one of the worst human rights abusers." 
					
					 What is ridiculous is that the U.S. cited "the Inquiry Commission's report" on human rights in the DPRK whose hypocrisy had already been brought to light, and is calling for referring it to the International Criminal Court. 
					
					 The above-said farce staged by the U.S. once again clearly reveals its hostile intention to hurt the ideology and social system in the DPRK and impair the dignity and authority of the headquarters of the DPRK at any cost under the pretext of "protecting human rights". 
					
					 This is nothing but the last-ditch effort of the hostile forces taken aback by the more powerful demonstration of the unbreakable single-minded unity of the army and people of the DPRK around the leader through the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 After sustaining setbacks in the political and military confrontation with the DPRK and a total failure of its policy toward the DPRK, the U.S. is resorting to the moves to destabilize it, peddling such issues as "human rights" and "freedom of religion" as the last expedient. It is trumpeting about "freedom of religion" though it has resorted to the moves for toppling the social systems of those countries courting its displeasure and destabilizing them in all parts of the world by abusing the freedom of religion. This is the height of hypocrisy. 
					
					 It has already been known well that wicked pseudo "religious organizations" at the prodding of the U.S. lured and kidnapped DPRK innocent citizens and reduced them to "defectors from the north" and are using them for anti-DPRK operations in a crafty and sinister manner.
					
					 The U.S. has not even elementary qualifications to talk about the freedom of religion and religious faith as it indiscriminately bombed Christian churches and killed many religionists during the past Korean war and is fostering contradictions among religions in every part of the world for the purpose of dominating the world.
					
					 The U.S. is slandering the DPRK under all sorts of absurd pretexts, pursuant to the extreme hostile policy toward it. This is touching off surging hatred and resentment among the service personnel and people of the DPRK who regard Korean socialism centered on the popular masses as their life and soul.
					
					 All the service personnel and people of the DPRK fully determined to devotedly defend the headquarters of the revolution will strongly react against the persistent "human rights" racket kicked up by the U.S. to bring down the social system of the DPRK, obsessed by the inveterate repugnancy and hostility toward it.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Indonesian Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Indonesian Delegation
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA) of the DPRK, had a talk with a delegation of the Constitution Examination Commission of the People's Consultative Council of Indonesia led by Vice-Chairman TB. Hasanuddin which paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Friday.

articles.title: Indonesian Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Indonesian Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Constitution Examination Commission of the People's Consultative Council of Indonesia led by Vice-Chairman TB. Hasanuddin left here for home Friday.

articles.title: Plenary Meeting of C.C., Youth League Held
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of "A Just Russia"
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Chairman of "A Just Russia"
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from S. M. Mironov, chairman of "A Just Russia", on September 28.
					 The chairman in the message extended congratulations to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to all the Korean people on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, the significant day, on behalf of "A Just Russia", a political party, and on his own behalf.
					
					 Throughout the history of the DPRK, the WPK has achieved social unity on the road of building a modern and developed socialist state and aroused the people of the DPRK to perform labor feats and devotedly serve the country, the message said.
					
					 Even under the present complicated situation the WPK is successfully attaining the goals set forth in various fields including socio-economy and culture, it noted, and continued:
					
					 "A Just Russia" maintains normal relations with the WPK and will further develop such relations.
					
					 The message wished Kim Jong Un and all the Korean people peace, greater success and prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from General Secretary of Revolutionary Party of Tanzania
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Abdulrahman O. Kinana, general secretary of the Revolutionary Party of Tanzania, on September 25.
					 The general secretary in the message extended the warmest congratulations to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on the 70th birthday of the WPK, October 10, 2015 on behalf of the National Executive Committee of his party and on his own behalf
					
					 The message expressed belief that the relations between the two parties would grow stronger in the common interests of the peoples of the two countries and successes would be achieved in the work of the two parties for achieving unity and prosperity.

articles.title: Russian Government Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Russian Government Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A Russian government delegation led by Alexandr Galushka, minister of Development of Far East, left here for home on Friday after taking part in the event for closing the year of DPRK-Russia Friendship.

articles.title: Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave Here
articles.content:
Delegations, Delegates of Juche Idea Study Organizations Leave Here
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of organizations for the study of Juche idea left here by air on Friday after participating in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included the director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea and his party, delegations of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, Slovak Association for Supporting the Juche Idea, Russian organizations for the study of the Juche idea, Moldovan organizations for the study of the Juche idea and a delegate of the February 16 Society for the Study of Juche Idea and Songun Politics of Belarus.
					
					 Departing here earlier was a delegation of the Warsaw Group for the Study of the Juche Idea.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Leave
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Leave
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federal Republic of Germany-DPRK Association and a delegation of the Iceland-DPRK Friendship and Cultural Society left here for home on Friday after taking part in the celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Leaving here earlier were a Russian friendship delegation, a delegation of Artyom City of Maritime Territory of Russia, a delegation of the Korean Friendship Association, a Finnish friendship delegation, a delegation of the France-Korea Friendship Association, a delegation of the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge, a friendship visiting group of the Choson Exchange Association in Singapore, the national secretary general of the Australia-DPRK Association for Friendship and Culture and his party and the secretary general of the Indonesia-Korea Association for Friendship and Cultural Exchange.

articles.title: Delegation of Kim Il Sung University Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
Delegation of Kim Il Sung University Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Kim Il Sung University headed by Thae Hyong Chol, president of the university and minister of Higher Education, left here on Friday to visit several universities of Russia.

articles.title: Guyanese President Stresses Need to Boost Relations with DPRK
articles.content:
Guyanese President Stresses Need to Boost Relations with DPRK 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Pak Chang Yul, DPRK ambassador to Guyana, presented his credentials to Guyanese President David Arthur Granger on October 8. 
					 The Guyanese president recalled with deep emotion that President Kim Il Sung separately received first President Arthur Chung and President Linden Forbes Sampson Burnham and said precious words to them. 
					
					 The Guyanese and Korean peoples are brothers who have steadily developed the relations of friendship and cooperation and Guyana fully supports the struggle of the DPRK government and people to independently and peacefully reunify the country, he said, adding it is the steadfast stand of himself and the Guyanese government to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries in various fields. 
					
					 He sincerely wished supreme leader of the Korean people Kim Jong Un good health and big success in his noble work of leading the Korean people's struggle for socialism against imperialism.

articles.title: 8th National Exhibition of University Scientific Research Successes Opens
articles.content:
8th National Exhibition of University Scientific Research Successes Opens 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The 8th national exhibition of university scientific research successes opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition House on Friday. 
					 On display there are products, charts, etc. representing more than 1 600 valuable successes made by teachers, researchers and students of 80 odd universities in the capital and local areas through dynamic scientific researches into the improvement of the people's living standard and the building of a socialist economic power. 
					
					 The exhibition is divided into over 10 panels including agriculture, light industry, power industry, metal industry, railway transport, machine building, electronics and automation and medical science. They will offer opportunities of exchanging the successes and technologies acquired in the drive for solving scientific and technological issues arising in practice at present.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Choe Sang Gon, chairman of the State Science and Technology Commission, Hong So Hon, president of Kim Chaek University of Technology, officials concerned, university teachers, researchers and students across the country. 
					
					 Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, made an opening address.

articles.title: World Food Day Observed Here
articles.content:
World Food Day Observed Here 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- There took place an event on World Food Day at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday.
					 Present at the event were Ko Myong Hui, vice-minister of Agriculture, officials concerned, Darlene Tymo, representative of the WFP, the deputy representative of the FAO and members of the missions of international bodies, diplomatic envoys and staff members of foreign embassies here. 
					
					 Speakers referred to the fact that top priority has been given to the work to solve the food problem under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Recalling that many countries are suffering from food shortage in recent years, they said it is an important task facing the governments of all countries to solve the food problem by developing agriculture.
					
					 They pointed out that the DPRK has closely cooperated with various international organizations for the agricultural development on the principle of mutual benefit.
					
					 Introduced at the event were achievements and experience gained by the DPRK in various fields such as pomiculture, greenhouse vegetable cultivation and potato production.

articles.title: Joint Art Performance Goes on
articles.content:
Joint Art Performance Goes on
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A joint art performance of the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea is going on at Ryugyong Jong Ju Yong Gymnasium before full house every day. 
					 The number of the audience reached tens of thousands in a few days after its start. 
					
					 The performance began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were diverse numbers including mixed chorus and male chorus "Mother's Birthday," male chorus "Shine, the Name of the Sun," instrumental music and song "I Love You" and orchestral music "Pyongyang Is Best." 
					
					 The performers made an impressive representation of the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed by founding the Juche-oriented revolutionary party and bringing about epoch-making changes and prosperity. 
					
					 Also staged were numbers teaching truth that the people's worthy life, happiness and future are guaranteed by the mother party serving the people. 
					
					 The audience was mesmerized by female chorus "Our Comrade Kim Jong Un" and "We Have Missed You," female duet and pangchang "It Is My Happiness to Long to See You" and female solo "Loving Care for Our Destiny" presented by the Moranbong Band as they truthfully represented the feelings of all the service personnel and people who trust and follow Kim Jong Un as the protector of their destiny. 
					
					 The State Merited Chorus staged male quintet and chorus "Let's Not Abandon Revolutionary Faith Though We May Die," male chorus "We Will Go to Mt. Paektu," female chorus "We Will Follow Our Party Forever" and other numbers, deeply impressing the audience. 
					
					 The performance goes on.

articles.title: DPRK Championship in Full Swing
articles.content:
DPRK Championship in Full Swing 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The DPRK Championship is at its height.
					 Premier football matches are taking place on a round-robin basis at the May Day Stadium in Pyongyang.
					
					 Basketball, volleyball, table-tennis, boxing and field hockey games are going on at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium, the Table-Tennis Gymnasium in Chongchun Street and other gymnasiums in Pyongyang, while baseball game in Nampho City.
					
					 More than 10 sports events came to an end up till now.
					
					 The Defense Sports Team of the Korean People's Army renewed national records at women's individual and team categories in the 50m 3-position rifle shooting.
					
					 A series of good results have been witnessed in different sport events in the championships.

articles.title: Minju Joson Censures S. Korean Warmongers' War Preparations
articles.content:
Minju Joson Censures S. Korean Warmongers' War Preparations
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean military warmongers are moving to develop and deploy for an actual war 800 km-range ballistic missile by 2017. They are also pushing forward the organization of a special unit for attacking major strategic military facilities in the DPRK including its nuclear facilities.
					 They are examining the issue of organizing a flying unit for ensuring speed operation of infiltrating a special unit and the issue of manufacturing attack drones for striking targets in all parts of the DPRK.
					
					 According to OPLAN 5015, a combination of their previous anti-DPRK war scenarios, the warmongers are mulling spearheading south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises from 2017.
					
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Friday says this is a reckless action to escalate the tension on the Korean Peninsula and bring the north-south relations back to a catastrophe, adding this can never be tolerated.
					
					 What is most urgent for settling the issue of the peninsula at present is to build durable peace-keeping mechanism, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 However, the south Korean military warmongers are persistent in their frantic preparations for a war against the DPRK. This clearly shows who is the arch criminal deliberately aggravating the situation on the peninsula.
					
					 It is illogical for the south Korean military warmongers to become vocal about "provocation" with the backing of their U.S. master. This reminds one of a newborn puppy knowing no fear of a tiger. This is nothing but a cynical ploy to push the north-south relations to a deadlock in a premeditated and deliberate manner and shift the blame for it on to the other. This will not work on anybody.
					
					 War is not a game, the commentary notes, warning the south Korean authorities not to misjudge the patience and magnanimity shown by the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Paper Slams Chief Executive for Her Absurd Remarks
articles.content:
S. Korean Paper Slams Chief Executive for Her Absurd Remarks
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on October 14 in an editorial blasted the absurd remarks of the south Korean chief executive on the issue of the history textbook. 
					 The editorial said the chief executive brought together chief secretaries of Chongwadae and clarified before them her stand on using the "state-compiled history textbook" but her utterances were peppered with so sheer sophism and self-righteous jargons that it is hard to find proper words to comment on them. 
					
					 It is an arrogant and irresponsible attitude for the chief executive to claim that a partisan strife is sparked by someone though she is responsible for conflict and dispute, the editorial said. 
					
					 It lashed out at her for depicting the May 16 military coup "as May revolution which inherited the April 19 popular uprising" and painting the Park Chung-Hee regime as "a revolutionary regime."

articles.title: S. Korean "Prime Minister's" Remarks Accused
articles.content:
S. Korean "Prime Minister's" Remarks Accused
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The permanent representative and co-representatives of the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea in a statement on Oct. 14 denounced the "prime minister" for making remarks allowing Japan's reinvasion of the Korean Peninsula.
					 The statement recalled that the "prime minister" that day said south Korea will allow the Japan "Self-Defense Forces" to reinvade the Korean Peninsula in an unavoidable case.
					
					 This is little short of declaring that he would overlook the outbreak of a war on the peninsula due to Japan, it charged.
					
					 The "prime minister's" attempt to plunge the people again into the danger of war and aggression cannot be construed otherwise than an act of attaining the political concession by staking the people's life, it held.
					
					 It demanded the "prime minister" step down at once, being responsible for his absurd remarks.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Int'l Body on Its Website
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People" was posted by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain on its website on October 6. 
					 The work published on Oct. 3, Juche 79 (1990) clarifies the idea that the party's leadership is a sure guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and deals with the issue of developing the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the Juche-type revolutionary party and clarifies basic ways for the party to fulfill its mission and duty as a political leadership body.

articles.title: WPK Praised by International Organization
articles.content:
WPK Praised by International Organization
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Articles were posted on internet website on October 6 by the Korean Friendship Association headquartered in Spain praising the exploits President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il performed in party-building and the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					 Posted on the homepage were portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Seen there were articles titled "Invincibility of the Workers' Party of Korea", "Party praised by the people", "70 years of leading the people" and "Blizzards of Paektu".
					
					 The articles said:
					
					 The President is the eternal leader of the Korean people who fathered the Juche idea and founded the WPK guided by it.
					
					 General Secretary Kim Jong Il is an extraordinary leader who developed the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party true to the idea and the cause of the President.
					
					 Kim Jong Un who is faithfully carrying forward and developing the idea and the cause of the preceding leaders represents the dignity of the WPK and a symbol of its invincibility.
					
					 The future of socialist Korea is rosy as it has another outstanding leader.
					
					 Thanks to the leadership of Kim Jong Un the WPK will win one victory after another in the future, too.

articles.title: Inaugural Ceremonies of Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouses Held Abroad
articles.content:
Inaugural Ceremonies of Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouses Held Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Events to welcome visitors to the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouses took place in Guinea and Indonesia and an inaugural ceremony of those greenhouses in Dandong, China between October 3 and 8 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Displayed there were photos of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias, the famous flowers.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea paid highest tribute to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who performed immortal exploits before the history and humankind by conducting great revolutionary practices with their outstanding ideas and theories.
					
					 The chairman of the Guinea-Korea Friendship Association and the permanent secretary of the Guinean People's Assembly praised the great leaders for founding the WPK and developing it into an organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people.
					
					 The director general of a flower garden council in Jakarta said: The Kimilsungia which President Sukarno presented to President Kim Il Sung is a symbol of the friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK.  He vowed to make positive efforts to make this immortal flower come into fuller blossom in the future to convey the great exploits of Kim Il Sung to posterity.
					
					 The general manager of the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Greenhouse in Dandong, China hoped Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia will come into full bloom thanks to the reverence of the peoples of the two countries. He noted that he make greater efforts to cultivating the flowers.

articles.title: National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Finland
articles.content:
National Seminar on Juche Idea Held in Finland
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- A national seminar on the Juche idea was held in Helsinki, Finland on Oct. 8 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed on the front wall of the venue of the seminar were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Speeches were made by Juha Kieksy, chairman of the Finnish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, and other personages.
					
					 They said that the founding of the WPK by Kim Il Sung 70 years ago was an event that paved the way for fully embodying the Juche idea in the Korean revolution and the world socialist movement. It is important for the adherents to the Juche idea to know well about the history of the WPK, they added.
					
					 They noted that thanks to the Juche idea centered on the popular masses founded by Kim Il Sung and developed by Kim Jong Il the WPK could turn the DPRK into a powerful socialist state despite the imperialists' moves to stifle it and all difficulties.
					
					 Noting that Marshal Kim Jong Un formulated the great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism as the guiding idea of the WPK and is leading the Korean people to victory only, they expressed their resolution to make positive efforts to study hard his works and widely disseminate the Juche idea among the Finnish people.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks were held in Russia, the Czech Republic and Iran, receptions in Mongolia and Korean photo exhibition in Uganda from Oct. 2 to 7 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting the feats President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un performed in party-building. 
					
					 The chairman of the Maritime Territorial branch of the All-Russia War Veterans' Social Organization "Militant Fraternity" said that the 70-year history of the WPK proves that only when all people get united as one around the party can they win victory only despite all difficulties and trials. 
					
					 The chairman of the Central Czech Provincial Committee of the Communist Party of Czech and Moravia said Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il achieved unity and cohesion of the party, leading the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					 Under the wise guidance of Kim Jong Un who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of the preceding leaders the WPK and the  Korean people are pushing ahead with the building of  a thriving nation while firmly defending socialism.
					
					 The chairman of the Uganda-DPRK Friendship Association noted that the 70-year history of the WPK is a proud one of victory and honor, stressing that thanks to the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il the Korean people could safeguard the country and achieve great successes in socialist construction.

articles.title: WPK's Cause Is Invincible: Beninese Figure
articles.content:
WPK's Cause Is Invincible: Beninese Figure
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The 70-year history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) clearly proves that the cause of the party of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il is invincible.
					 Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said this in a statement released on Oct. 9 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Il Sung founded the WPK guided by the Juche idea, built a country for the people on the land of Korea for the first time in its history spanning five thousand years and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the revolutionary party protecting and meeting the people's wishes and interests and turned the DPRK into a powerful nuclear weapons state and space power.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un advanced the new line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force to remarkably bolster the war deterrence and resolutely shattered reckless nuclear blackmail and war moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers with his brilliant wisdom and matchless grit.
					
					 The Socialist Party of Benin sincerely wishes the WPK and the Korean people greater success in building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Missions in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Political parties, ministries, organizations, institutions and personages of different countries sent floral baskets and bouquets to the DPRK missions in relevant countries from Oct. 6 to 9 in celebration of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, the ministries of Foreign Affairs, Defence, Public Security, Industry and Commerce, Culture, Sports and Tourism, Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union of Vietnam, Nhan Dan newspaper office, the  General Confederation of Labor, Farmers Union, Academy of Social Science, Ho Chi Minh Museum, Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Kindergarten, Islamic Revolutionary Proletarian Organization of Iran, "Workers' House", Indian People's Party, Indian National Congress Party, Communist Party of India (Marxist), Communist Party of India, All-India Forward Bloc, All India Indo-Korean Friendship Association, People's Party of Cambodia, Funcinpec Party, Khmer Democratic Party of Cambodia, International Commerce Promotion Center of Myanmar, Chamber of Commerce and Industry, Rice Federation of Myanmar, Brazilian Communist Party, Party for Free Motherland, Brazilian
					
					  preparatory committee for celebrating the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea, Central Committee of the Communist Party of Venezuela, deputy prime minister in charge of Royal Palace of Cambodia, speaker of the National Assembly of Kuwait, editor-in-chief of Kuwait Times, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, co-chairman of the Board of Directors of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, general manager of the Golden Trip Travel Service Co. Ltd., Hong Kong, China, chairperson of the Emperor Group of Hong Kong, China, secretary general of the China Hong Kong Zhonghwa Energy Fund Commission and the president a shipping company of Hong Kong, China.
					
					 The floral baskets and bouquets were laid before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Foreign Delegations, Delegates Visit DPRK Missions
articles.content:
Foreign Delegations, Delegates Visit DPRK Missions 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- Delegations and delegates of foreign political parties and organizations paid congratulatory visits to the DPRK missions in their countries from October 3 to 9 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The visitors laid floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and their full-length picture and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They included a delegation of Nigerian political parties grouping the members of the leadership of 10 political parties, delegation of the Workers' Party of Mexico, delegation of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, delegation of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, the chairman of the People's Front of Workers, Peasants and Students of Peru, the general secretary of the Revolutionary Socialist Party of Peru, the international secretary of the Socialist Political Action Party of Peru, the vice department director of International Affairs of the Peruvian Communist Party, the curator of Kim Jong Suk Library, the chairman of the Peru-Korea Friendship Institute for Study of the Juche Based Songun Policy, the chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Central Executive Committee of the Bangladesh National Socialist Party, the general secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Bangladesh (Marxist-Leninist), the general secre
					
					 tary of the C.C., the Socialist Party of Bangladesh, the chairman of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea and the chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced in DR Congo 
 Pyongyang, October 16 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Cause of the Great Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il Is Ever-Victorious" was posted on the website of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo on October 7. 
					 The work, published on October 4, Juche 104 (2015), clarifies the idea that the seven-decade long history of the WPK is the proud one of victory which demonstrated the validity and invincibility of the cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and that the sacred cause of the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il is always sure to triumph.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 350 de EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 350 de EPC
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, inspecciono la Unidad 350 del EPC.
					Ante todo, el Mariscal recorrio el monumento en memoria de la visita de orientacion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria y la otra de presentacion del historial.
					
					Observando los valiosos datos historicos, recordo con gran emocion la enorgullecedora trayectoria del desarrollo de la unidad transcurrida bajo la atencion del Dirigente.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de intensificar la educacion en las imperecederas hazanas de orientacion del Dirigente para formar a todos los uniformados como fuertes en la ideologia y conviccion identicos al Dirigente, como combatientes listos para combatir uno contra cien enemigos y como militares valientes que aniquilen de un tiron con fuertes punos a los enemigos.
					
					Pasando revista a las salas de estudio de operaciones, la leccion militar y la de entrenamiento general, el Mariscal averiguo detalladamente la mision combativa y el estado de entrenamiento de la unidad.
					
					Evaluo altamente a los oficiales y soldados de la unidad quienes registraron las proezas en el adiestramiento de este ano con la unica voluntad de glorificar el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del PTC con los resultados de entrenamiento combativo-politico.
					
					Es muy importante la mision de la unidad 350, acoto y presento las tareas para intensificar por todos los medios la  combatividad de la unidad.
					
					Recorriendo la biblioteca y la casa de los soldados de la unidad, el Mariscal subrayo que los dias de servicio militar deben ser el curso de estudio en la universidad revolucionaria al formar a los militares como los talentosos dotados de los conocimientos multilaterales.
					
					Instruyo enfocar la fuerza a la intensificacion de la educacion de 5 tipos presentada por el Partido para formar a todos los uniformados como indoblegables combatientes que no renuncien la conviccion revolucionaria aunque mueran.
					
					Tambien el Mariscal estuvo en el comedor de los militares, el almacen de provision diaria, el otro de soya, etc.
					
					Realizar bien la labor de intendencia para los soldados es una importante llave para la perfeccion de preparativos de combate, recalco y continuo que los oficiales deben prestar siempre profunda atencion a este trabajo teniendo bien presente que esta labor es precisamente la batalla por la defensa del socialismo.
					
					Caminando durante largo tiempo por el recinto de la unidad parecida a una casa de reposo, el Mariscal departio con sus oficiales y analizo el estado de administracion de la unidad.
					
					Contemplando con satisfaccion los frondosos bosques en las montanas circundantes, el Mariscal asevero que el EPC debe tomar merecidamente la delantera en materializar el noble proposito del partido de realizar la reforestacion y la creacion de jardines de todo el pais.
					
					 El Mariscal dio a la unidad los gemelos y el fusil automatico y se fotografio junto con los militares.
					
					Le acompanaron Hwang Pyong So y O Kum Chol.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC denuncia alborotos de "DDHH" de EE.UU.
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC denuncia alborotos de "DDHH" de EE.UU. 
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por la ACNC en relacion con que Estados Unidos  acusa perversamente a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en cuanto al problema de la libertad de religion, el portavoz del MINREX de la RPDC dio el dia 16 la siguiente respuesta:
					El dia 14, el Departamento de Estado norteamericano  publico un "informe sobre la libertad de religion internacional 2014", ocasion en la cual acuso la RPDC de "Estado especialmente preocupante" y de "uno de los paises violadores de DDHH".
					
					Lo mas ridiculo es que propuso someter a la consideracion  del Corte Penal Internacional el "informe del Comite de Averiguacion" relativo al estado de DDHH de Corea, cuya falsedad fue revelada ya.
					
					La publicacion del presente informe demuestra fehacientemente la enemistad de EE.UU. tendente a difamar a toda costa la idea y el regimen de la RPDC y manchar la dignidad y el prestigio de nuestra Direccion so pretexto de la "defensa de DDHH".
					
					Todo esto no pasa de ser ultimo coletazo de las fuerzas hostiles asustadas por el hecho de que a traves de los actos festivos por el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, se manifesto plenamente el poderio de la invencible unidad monolitica de nuestro ejercito y el pueblo  unidos en torno al lider.
					
					Al fracasarse la confrontacion politica y militar con la RPDC, EE.UU. recurre a las maniobras de desintegracion interna acusandola de "DDHH", "libertad de la religion" y otros para escaparse de la bancarrota total de su politica sobre la RPDC.
					
					Es el climax de hipocresia el que EE.UU. aboga por la "libertad de la religion" mientras se entrega en todas las partes del mundo al derrumbe del regimen y la desintegracion interna contra los paises desgraciados, abusando de la libertad de la religion.
					
					Ya todo el mundo sabe que bajo el amparo del imperio, las seudo "organizaciones religiosas" atraen y secuestran con metodos tan astutos a nuestros habitantes inocentes y los transforman en "fugitivos norcoreanos" para utilizarlos en la conspiracion contra la RPDC.
					
					Durante la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. bombardeo indiscriminadamente hasta las iglesias de cristianos, asesino a muchos religiosos y hoy en dia tambien agrava en todas partes la rivalidad entre las religiones para tomar la hegemonia mundial, razon por la cual el imperio no tiene la calificacion elemental de hablar sobre la libertad de la religion y credo.
					
					Las maniobras de EE.UU. que insiste persistentemente en la politica hostil anti-RPDC entregandose a calumniar la RPDC falsificando todo tipo de pretexto producen el odio e indignacion de nuestro ejercito y el pueblo que aprecian como vida el socialismo a estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares.
					
					Todo el ejercito y el pueblo coreanos decididos a defender a ultranza la Direccion de la Revolucion, se enfrentaran hasta el fin con las medidas sobreduras a las maniobras de EE.UU. que preso de veto y enemistad arraigados a la RPDC, sigue recurriendo a la campana de "DDHH" para derrumbar nuestro regimen.

articles.title: Portavoz de Comite de Educacion advierte a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Portavoz de Comite de Educacion advierte a autoridades surcoreanas
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- Las actuales autoridades conservadoras del Sur de Corea publicaron oficialmente el pasado dia 12 el "sistema de manual redactado por el gobierno" que impone a las escuelas secundarias y  superiores usar obligatoriamente el manual de historia hecho por el "gobierno". 
					El susodicho "sistema" se aplico desde 1974, periodo de gobernacion de Park Chung Hee, bajo pretexto de establecer entre los estudiantes la "correcta concepcion de estado" y vino malempleandose para embellecer la dictadura de "innovacion", justificar la dictadura proyanqui, projapones y fascista e inculcar la confrontacion fratricida.
					
					En su nota publicada la vispera, el portavoz del Comite de Educacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea condeno que tal medida deviene un golpe historial sin precedente encaminada a embellecer y resucitar la dictadura fascista y el bochornoso pasado de caracter proyanqui y projapones y de servilismo a grandes potencias, y continuo:
					
					Los hechos demuestran claramente que llegan a la etapa extremadamente imprudente y peligrosa las maquinaciones de las actuales fuerzas conservadoras en el poder para exterminar totalmente la justicia y el progreso en el suelo surcoreano y convertir la sociedad en la reaccionaria y conservadora.
					
					Lo grave del caso es que las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas en el poder cometen sin vacilacion alguna los actos provocadores de difamar astutamente la dignidad, el sistema y la sagrada historia de la RPDC para justificar su payasada.
					
					La imprudencia de los compinches titeres que se desesperan para inyectar a las nuevas generaciones la conciencia de confrontacion fratricida tergiversando la veracidad de la historia, pone al desnudo su naturaleza anti-reunificacion que persiguen no la reconciliacion y la unidad de ambas partes coreanas sino la hostilidad y el enfrentamiento.
					
					Esos compinches recurren a la aplicacion del "sistema" arriba citado con la malsana meta de ocultar su desagradable historia y lograr su ambicion de gobernacion perenne al convertir la sociedad en la reaccionaria y conservadora.
					
					Pero, jamas podran evitar la sentencia dura de toda la nacion los actos criminales de las fuerzas conservadoras surcoreanas en el poder que se entregan abiertamente a dar el sablazo a la verdad de la historia y a cometer provocaciones politicas para lograr su vil objetivo politico.

articles.title: Efectuada 57a reunion plenaria del CC de UJS
articles.content:
Efectuada 57a reunion plenaria del CC de UJS
Pyongyang, 16 de octubre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 15 en esta capital la 57a reunion plenaria del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung.
					En la ocasion tomaron parte los miembros del CC de la UJS y los funcionarios del centro y localidades de esta organizacion juvenil.
					
					En la reunion se discutio el tema sobre la convocacion de la IX Conferencia de la UJS.
					
					Hubo el informe del presidente del CC de la UJS, Jon Yong Nam y otras intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores se refirieron a que bajo la profunda atencion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un se convocara la IX Conferencia de la UJS con motivo del aniversario 70 de la fundacion de la UJS.
					
					Dijeron que la medida del Mariscal refleja la maxima confianza y esperanza de que la UJS y los jovenes pongan de mas pleno  manifiesto la combatividad y el poderio como vanguardia y fidedigno flanco del PTC en el cumplimento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Enfatizaron que las organizaciones y funcionarios de la UJS deben dinamizar las labores organizativas y politicas destinadas a acoger la conferencia con elevado entusiasmo politico y brillantes exitos laborales guardando en lo profundo del corazon el proposito del Mariscal.
					
					Llamaron a todas las organizaciones y funcionarios de la UJS a ostentar a todo el mundo el gallardo aspecto de la potencia de la juventud en la marcha para glorificar la conferencia como gran festival juvenil de la potencia del monte Paektu, siguiendo la direccion de Songun del Mariscal.
					
					La reunion plenaria decidio convocar la conferencia en esta capital en enero del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche con motivo del septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion de la UJS.
